instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..
definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U5110: What is U5110? This chip is responsible for SMC_RESET_L in many Macbook models..
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.SMC_ONOFF_L: What is SMC_ONOFF_L? SMC_ONOFF_L tells the computer that the power button has been pressed when it is low, _L means signal is asserted when it is low voltage. .
definitions.SMC_LSOC_RST_L: What is SMC_LSOC_RST_L? SMC_LSOC_RST_L is a signal that comes out of the trackpad on Macbook Airs that can reset the SMC.  _L means whatever before the _L in the signal name is asserted when it is low voltage, such as 0.0v to 0.5v..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> after shutdown cant turn on with battery alone
threads.message:
i have this macbook customer say cant on. 
when i reconnect the battery and tried to charge can on. 
but when i shutdown with battery alone cant on. 
u can turn on only when the charger is conected. sometimes after boots shutdown itself. sometimes cant turn on totally 
tried put the mainboard to known good case including battery keybord lio board and flex etc. still same
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> is 8.59V

with/without keyboard battery disconnected.
<CHIP>U5110</CHIP>
1 3.4v
2 0V
3 3.4v
4 2.7v 
5 3.38v
6 0.5v
7 3.4v
8 3.29v
when triggering <SIGNAL>SMC_ONOFF_L</SIGNAL> from 3.4v drops to 0.4v with or without keyboard. 
the magsafe light from amber turns green when trigger power button. with or without keyboard.
